definition: History of the Ming Dynasty, twenty fourth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhang Tingyu 張廷玉|张廷玉[Zhang1 Ting2 yu4] in 1739 during the Qing Dynasty, 332 scrolls
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
surname Shi

sentences.english: The third chapter is about the compilation state in mid period of Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，論述了清中期南明史編撰狀況。

sentences.english: Chinese food is an important part of Chinese civilization history.
sentences.chinese: 中國菜是中華民族文明史的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The Ming History written during the Qing Dynasty includes very rich information about Europe.
sentences.chinese: 清修《明史》包含相當豐富的歐洲內容。

sentences.english: And in human civilizations, dreams have always been regarded as a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 在人類文明史上，夢始終被人們視爲一個謎。

sentences.english: The history of human beings is a history of system transition.
sentences.chinese: 人類文明史是一部制度變遷史。

sentences.english: The second part mainly introduced Toynbee the civilized history viewpoint profound implication.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要介紹了湯因比文明史觀的深邃蘊涵。

sentences.english: Hangzhou boasts a 5,000-year history of civilization, and her Liangzhu Civilization was one of the cradles of Chinese Civilization.
sentences.chinese: 多年的文明史，良渚文化是中華文明的發祥地之一。

sentences.english: Calvin: I'll take the information to C Star, and study your civilization history.
sentences.chinese: 我會把這些信息帶回C星球，研究你們的文明史。

sentences.english: She is old, because she is a big Oriental country with a civilization stretching back several thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 說她古老，她是一個有着數千年文明史的東方大國。

sentences.english: Chapter three argues about the significance of landmark to the civilization history.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，地標的人類文明史意義。

sentences.english: The 5000-year history of Chinese culture is a history of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 中國五千年的文明史本身就是一部美的歷史。

sentences.english: China's history of civilization is the history of the world a bright Wonder.
sentences.chinese: 中國的文明史也是世界歷史上一株璀璨的奇葩。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter discusses the compilation state at the late Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，論述了清季南明史編纂狀況。

sentences.english: The third part mainly is gives Toynbee the civilized history viewpoint the evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要是給予湯因比文明史觀的評析。

sentences.english: It is mistaken to define the writer of the manuscript entitled Biographies of the History of the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 抄本《明史列傳》的撰者被定爲徐乾學是錯誤的。

sentences.english: Two hundred years seems like the blink of an eye in the history of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 二百年時間在中國文明史上只不過是一瞬間。

definition: annals of the Ming Dynasty 明朝[Ming2 chao2] (1368-1644)

History of the Song Dynasty, twentieth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 496 scrolls/(not to be confused with 宋書|宋书[Song4 shu1])

Draft History of the Qing Dynasty, sometimes listed as number 25 or 26 of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhao Erxun 趙爾巽|赵尔巽[Zhao4 Er3 xun4] in 1927 during the Northern Warlords period, 536 scrolls
History of the Yuan Dynasty, twenty third of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Song Lian 宋濂[Song4 Lian2] in 1370 during the Ming Dynasty, 210 scrolls

A Mirror for the Wise Ruler (or Comprehensive Mirror for Aid in Government), a vast chronological general history, written by 司馬光|司马光[Si1 ma3 Guang1] Sima Guang (1019-1089) and collaborators during the Northern Song in 1084, covering the period 403 BC-959 AD, 294 scrolls
history book
Qing historical archive, currently 4484 scrolls
the Yongle Great Encyclopedia (1408)
the 24 or 25 official dynastic histories/true history, as opposed to fictional adaptation or popular legends
History of the Jurchen Jin Dynasty, twenty second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 135 scrolls

History of the Later Tang Dynasty, seventeenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Ouyang Xiu 歐陽修|欧阳修[Ou1 yang2 Xiu1] and Song Qi 宋祁[Song4 Qi2] in 1060 during Northern Song 北宋[Bei3 Song4], 225 scrolls
Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)
historical records
History of the Liao Dynasty, twenty first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 116 scrolls
